data.title: Famous Birthdays on July 25
data.meta_description: Famous birthdays for the 25th of July. See which celebrities, historical figures, scientists and criminals were born on July 25.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 221

Thietmar, German chronicler and Bishop of Merseburg, born in Hildesheim, Saxony (d. 1018)

Casimir I the Restorer, Polish nobleman (Duke of Poland, 1040-58), born in Kraków, Poland (d. c. 1058)

Afonso I the Conqueror, King of Portugal (1143-85), born in Guimarães, Portugal (d. 1185)

Albert I, Duke of Bavaria and third son of Louis IV, Holy Roman Emperor, born in Munich (d. 1404)

James I

King of Scots (1406-37), born in Dunfermline Palace, Scotland [1]

Philip I, Duke of Brabant (1427-30) (d. 1430)

Henry Percy, 3rd Earl of Northumberland, English politician, born in Leconfield, United Kingdom (d. 1461)

Jacques Peletier (du Mans), French poet and scientist, born in Le Mans, France (d. 1582)

Kiyomasa Kato, Japanese warlord, born in Owari Province, Japan (d. 1611)

Christoph Scheiner, German astronomer and physicist, born in Markt Wald, Germany (d. 1650)

Valerius Otto, German composer, born in Leipzig, Electorate of Saxony (d. after 1612)
